K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-049:472a-2: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-049:472a-3: de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-049:472a-10: p'urba yo ga sma ra padma hast'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-049:472a-11: gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-049:472a-12: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig sten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-049:472a-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so //
